meanings.definition: individuals who engage in hacking or other forms of cybercrime
meanings.sent1: The cyberpunks were caught hacking into the company's database.
meanings.sent2: Cyberpunks are known for their skills in computer hacking.
meanings.sent3: The cyberpunks tried to hack into the school's grading system but ended up changing all the grades to A+.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cybersecurity, the cyberpunks are the modern-day pirates.
meanings.sent5: The cyberpunks lurked in the shadows of the internet, seeking their next target.

meanings.definition: a subculture of individuals who embrace technology and reject traditional societal norms
meanings.sent1: The cyberpunks gathered at the tech convention to showcase their latest innovations.
meanings.sent2: In the cyberpunk community, it is cool to be different from the mainstream.
meanings.sent3: The cyberpunks organized a protest against outdated technology regulations.
meanings.sent4: She stood out in the crowd with her cyberpunk style, a mix of neon colors and futuristic accessories.
meanings.sent5: The cyberpunks lived on the edge of society, embracing a digital way of life.

meanings.definition: a genre of science fiction literature or film that focuses on futuristic, dystopian societies
meanings.sent1: The cyberpunks novel painted a vivid picture of a dark, tech-driven future.
meanings.sent2: Fans of cyberpunks movies enjoy the thrilling blend of technology and rebellion.
meanings.sent3: The cyberpunks film festival featured a marathon of dystopian classics.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cyberpunks literature, imagination knows no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The cyberpunks genre explores the consequences of unchecked technological advancement.
